attributes.additional_details: Uber is paying 0.75 per mile for drivers picking up from the airport
attributes.background:
We are group of drivers. 
This is to inform uber we are not happy with 0.75 per-mile price and can not make a profit out of it waiting  there for 2 hours and paying car park and fuel ⛽. Its les then minimum wage we are demanding price increase for all airport to make sense

rejection.details: This is a matter for Uber, not the UK Government or Parliament.
